File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary, acknowledgements, and contact information.
File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata (2021)

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines columns headers across all csv files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021)

File_Description: R script to process FTICR-MS data.
Calibration file needed to process FTICR-MS data.
Instructions for working with FTICR-MS data.

Dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC); non-purgeable organic carbon (NPOC); total nitrogen (TN);  total suspended solids (TSS); and ions from water samples. Methods information is embedded with methods codes that are defined in SPS_Methods_Codes.csv. The file follows the beta version of the ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Soil, Sediment, and Water Chemistry data (Boye et al. In prep.).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Soil, Sediment, and Water Chemistry (Boye et al. In prep.)

File_Description: Sample metadata including sample name information for each vial used during the campaign and accompanying information captured in the field (i.e. coordinates; date; stream name).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021)

File_Description: File that maps between sample names and registered International Geo Sample Numbers (IGSNs). Includes metadata required by ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020). Some fields are repeated from the field metadata.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: Definitions of methods codes used in SPS_DIC_NPOC_TN_TSS_Ions.csv.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Soil, Sediment, and Water Chemistry (Boye et al. In prep.)

File_Description: Step-by-step instructions used to complete the sampling in the field.
Step-by-step instructions used to complete the sensor deployment in the field.

Raw FTICR-MS instrument files. The first asterisk * indicates sample name. The second asterisk is the replicate indicator (1; 2; or 3). The ion accumulation time (IAT) is after the letter "p". Each sample had three replicates.
